mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.*, (@row_number:=@row_number + 1) AS rownum FROM movie m, (SELECT @row_number:=0) AS t ORDER BY releaseDate DESC ) AS ranked_movies WHERE rownum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT * FROM movie WHERE genre LIKE CONCAT('%', #{genre}, '%') AND releasedate BETWEEN '2020-12-31' AND '2024-03-17' ORDER BY releasedate DESC
SELECT * FROM movie WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parameter}, '%')
SELECT * FROM movie ORDER BY releaseDate DESC LIMIT 15;
